My Workflow

How about creating a site without touching HTML or creating a LaTeX resume without knowing LaTeX!? Enter resume-generator-action! ðŸŽ‰

Simply fill in this data.yml file and your website and resume will be live in GitHub pages. Make sure to enable GitHub Pages in your repository. Point the publishing source to gh-pages.

More Customization: ðŸŽ¨

  • Change the Jekyll theme in the _config.yml_jj2 file for a different look of your site
  • Modify the resume template and markdown template for a different layout of resume and your site respectively

Submission Category:

DIY Deployments

Yaml File or Link to Code

GitHub Repo

Additional Resources / Info

Live demo: Website | Resume

This project would not have been possible without the following open source projects:

  • moban: for generating the tex and markdown file from template
  • latex-action: for compiling LaTeX and creating PDF
  • actions-gh-pages: for deploying to GitHub pages
  • sb2nov/resume: for the awesome resume design

Please let me know if you have any feedback or if you want me to add new features! Thank you!
